Detailed Description

Graphics scene of the cell colony in the Qt Graphics framework with Open Dynamics Engine (ODE) simulation.

Derives from GraphicsCellScene, ODESimulation.

void GraphicsCellSceneODE::setCellPosition ( int  cellIndex,
double  x,
double  y 
)

Set the position of cell with index cellIndex.

Input coordinates are in the simulation coordinates system with range [0,1] and conversion to Graphics coordinate is automatically done.

Reimplemented from GraphicsCellScene.

void GraphicsCellSceneODE::computeODEStep ( float  timeStep  ) 

Compute timestep of the ODE simulation.

  • Compute the ODE step.

  • Send the cell positions and angle to the simulation/CellCollection object.
